item.description: Join us for a fun and informative evening. Olivier Koslowski, Mansfield Selectman, will come and tell us about his Citizen Initiative Petition to create a Voter ID requirement in MA. We will also have information regarding the other petitions. We will discuss the process of collecting signatures as well. All of our September meetings will cover the same topic! Between Voter ID and repealing the Romneycare individual mandate, we Tea Party activists have a lot of work to do!
item.name: August Norton/Mansfield Tea Party Meeting
